Package me.schlaubi.kaesk.api

Annotation Type Command

@Documented
@Retention(RUNTIME)
@Target(METHOD)
public @interface Command
Annotation that marks a method that invokes a command.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Fields Description
    static @NotNull java.lang.String INHERIT_PERMISSION
    Permission node that inherits permission from super command.

  • Optional Element Summary

    Optional Elements 
    Modifier and Type Optional Element Description
    boolean consoleAllowed
    Whether the console should be allowed to execute this command or not.
    @NotNull java.lang.String name
    The name of the command
    @NotNull java.lang.String permission
    The permission that is needed to execute the command
    boolean root
    Whether this is the root command or not.

  • Field Details

    • INHERIT_PERMISSION

      @NotNull static final @NotNull java.lang.String INHERIT_PERMISSION
      Permission node that inherits permission from super command.

  • Element Details

    • root

      boolean root
      Whether this is the root command or not.
      Returns:
      this is the root command
      Default:
      false

    • name

      @NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String name
      The name of the command
      Returns:
      the name of the command
      Default:
      ""

    • permission

      @NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String permission
      The permission that is needed to execute the command
      Returns:
      the permission
      Implementation Note:
      default is a blank string for no permission
      Default:
      "<@inherit>"

    • consoleAllowed

      boolean consoleAllowed
      Whether the console should be allowed to execute this command or not.
      Returns:
      whether console can execute the command or not
      Default:
      false
